wrong_way.description: Detects vehicles moving against the expected traffic flow direction. Options: up, down, left, right.

lane_violation.description: Define lane boundaries as [[x_start, x_end], ...] and restricted_lanes as [{lane_index, restricted_types: [Car, Motorcycle, Bus, Truck]}].

signal_zone.description: Set zone as [x1, y1, x2, y2] to define the red light crossing area. Set active to true when red light is on.

custom_rules.name: Illegal Parking
custom_rules.description: Define a restricted parking zone as [x1, y1, x2, y2]. Leave vehicle_types empty to apply to all.

custom_rules.name: Wrong Turn
custom_rules.description: Detects sudden direction changes exceeding the specified angle threshold.

_help.how_to_configure: Edit this file to enable/disable violations and set zone boundaries.
_help.restricted_lanes_example: [{"lane_index": 0, "restricted_types": ["Truck", "Bus"]}] restricts lane 0 for trucks and buses.
_help.signal_zone_example: Set zone to [100, 300, 500, 400] and active to true during red light.
_help.custom_zone_example: Set zone to [50, 50, 300, 200] to define a no-parking area.
